xxOffer XDG Desktop Portals screencast streams to X11 appsxx
将 XDG 桌面门户投屏视频流提供给 X11 应用程序

description.p: Many X11 apps will be using X11 mechanisms to share the contents of other applications and displays. In recent years we have created XDG Desktop Portals as the mechanism to provide this functionality and it's what we expect apps to be using. This application will provide the streams available to the XDG Desktop Portals to your legacy X11 apps that have not adopted the new system.
